featured.text: Which of the following statements can be inferred from the article?
What can be inferred about the author? (A)
What can be inferred from the study? (A) Sea snakes can easily survive long years of drought.
It can be inferred from the passage that Howard will probably gain his weight back again.
What can be inferred about the elephant’s behavior from this passage? (A) Elephants learn from their experiences.

other.text: It can be inferred that Ali had at the end of the story.
It can be inferred from the passage that a younger child is more likely to be a good __________.
We may infer from the article that Dumas ________.
It can be inferred from the passage that Hilfiger __________.
What can be inferred from the passage? (A) Scribner’s Monthly was a magazine promoting national parks.
Which of the following may be inferred about those who do serious exercise?
What can be inferred from this passage? .
Which of the following statements can be inferred from the passage? (A)
Which of the following statements about horror movies can be inferred from the passage? (A) Most horror movie lovers are prone to aggressive behavior.
Which of the following can be inferred from the passage about Zanzibar?
According to the examples mentioned in the passage, which blood type can we infer is the LEAST favored in Japan? (A) Type A. (B) Type B. (C) Type O. (D) Type AB. 43.
What can be inferred from the passage? (A) Cars will refuse to start if the driver is drunk.
We may infer from the passage that the author is a(n) __________.

definition.en_def: To deduce or conclude information from evidence and reasoning rather than from explicit statements.
definition.example: From her smile, I can infer that she is happy.
